title: Biden Vows ‘Consequences’ for Saudi Arabia After Oil Production Cut
description: Angered by the kingdom’s decision to team up with Russia, President Biden signaled openness to retaliatory measures, including a halt to arms sales and allowing price-fixing lawsuits.
dc:creator: Peter Baker
category: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
media:credit: Cheriss May for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden’s willingness to consider retaliatory measures represents a significant shift for a president who had sought to improve relations with Saudi Arabia in recent months.
